attributes.action: Ban the general sale of Fireworks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fireworks are now being used as weapons, at least two instances in the news this year. Is it not time to restrict the sale of such items to individuals or groups licensed/certified by the police, in a  manner similar to a firearms licence/certificate, and to restrict such a licence/certificate to persons over 21 years of age.  Also a similar licence/certificate should be required for any such dealers with similar conditions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
